External

The Set::External class handles Pods from external sources. Pods from external sources don't use the Source and are initialized by a given specification.

Inherits from:

Pod::Specification::Set

initialize

Signature

initialize(spec) #=> External

Returns

External A new instance of External

Source

def initialize(spec)
  @specification = spec.root
  super(@specification.name)
end

==(other) #=> undefined

Source

def ==(other)
  self.class === other && @specification == other.specification
end

spec/specification/set_spec.rb

required_by

Signature

required_by(dependency, dependent_name) #=> undefined

Source

def required_by(dependency, dependent_name)
  before = @specification
  super(dependency, dependent_name)
ensure
  @specification = before
end

lib/cocoapods-core/specification/set.rb:29

spec/specification/set_spec.rb

dependencyinherited

Signature

dependency #=> Dependency

Returns

Dependency

A dependency that includes all the versions requirements of the stored dependencies.

Source

def dependency
  @dependencies.inject(Dependency.new(name)) do |previous, dependency|
    previous.merge(dependency.to_root_dependency)
  end
end

Source Files

lib/cocoapods-core/specification/set.rb:72

spec/specification/set_spec.rb

required_versioninherited

Signature

required_version #=> Version

Returns

Version

The highest version that satisfies the stored dependencies.

Source

def required_version
  versions.find { |v| dependency.match?(name, v) } ||
    # TODO: this should simply return nil. Is CocoaPods that should raise.
    (raise StandardError, "Required version (#{dependency}) not found for `#{name}'.\nAvailable versions: #{versions.join(', ')}")
end

Source Files

lib/cocoapods-core/specification/set.rb:98

spec/specification/set_spec.rb

versions_by_sourceinherited

Signature

versions_by_source #=> Hash{Source => Version}

Returns

Hash{Source => Version}

All the available versions for the Pod grouped by source.

Source

def versions_by_source
  result = {}
  sources.each do |source|
    result[source] = source.versions(name)
  end
  result
end

Source Files

lib/cocoapods-core/specification/set.rb:114

spec/specification/set_spec.rb

to_sinherited

Signature

to_s #=> undefined

Source

def to_s
  "#<#{self.class.name} for `#{name}' with required version `#{required_version}' available at `#{sources.map(&:name) * ', '}'>"
end

def to_s
  "#<#{self.class.name} for `#{name}' with required version `#{required_version}' available at `#{sources.map(&:name) * ', '}'>"
